data.title: Joke Silva Celebrates Her Husband, Olu Jacobs’s 82nd Birthday – Independent Newspaper Nigeria
data.meta_description: Independent.ng - Nigeria News - Top Nigerian newspapers - Breaking news - Top news headlines from Nigeria and World.
data.text:
LAGOS – Olu Jacobs, the experienced Nollywood actor, is marking his 82nd birthday on Thursday, just shortly after untrue reports of his passing circulated on social media.

Joke Silva, Olu Jacobs’ wife, went on Instagram on Thursday to commemorate the occasion. She posted a video featuring the actor in a personalized house coat, offering him prayers and well-wishes.

She wrote, “82 just like that. Agba ko ni nira l’agbara Jesu.

“Happy birthday and have an amazing year ahead, my darling… Sir J of life _olujacobs (loving his customised

housecoat).”

Celebrities and fans have now started sending their congratulations to Jacobs on social media platforms.
